definition.name: NXentry
definition.doc: Test case for verifying handling of symbols inside a nexus class in nested layers of the hierarchy

symbol.name: nfa
symbol.doc: Number of fast axes (acquired simutaneously) e.g. emission angle, kinetic energy

symbol.name: nsa
symbol.doc: Number of slow axes (acquired scanning a physical quantity) e.g. lens voltage, photon energy or temperature

symbol.name: nx
symbol.doc: Number of points in the first angular direction

symbol.name: ne
symbol.doc: Number of points in the energy dispersion direction
